name: bitsplat
description: A really crude alternative to bittorrent where file transfer is done by physical devices.

scripts.publish-windows-aot: dotnet publish src/bitsplat/bitsplat.csproj -c Release -r win-x64 --framework net8.0 --self-contained True --output Publish/windows --verbosity Normal /property:PublishTrimmed=true /property:IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract=true /property:DebugType=None /property:DebugSymbols=False /property:EnableCompressionInSingleFile=true /property:TrimMode=partial
scripts.publish-linux-aot: dotnet publish src/bitsplat/bitsplat.csproj -c Release -r linux-x64 --framework net8.0 --self-contained True --output Publish/linux --verbosity Normal /property:PublishTrimmed=true /property:IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract=true /property:DebugType=None /property:DebugSymbols=False /property:EnableCompressionInSingleFile=true /property:TrimMode=partial
scripts.publish-osx-aot: dotnet publish src/bitsplat/bitsplat.csproj -c Release -r osx-x64 --framework net8.0 --self-contained True --output Publish/osx --verbosity Normal /property:PublishTrimmed=true /property:IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract=true /property:DebugType=None /property:DebugSymbols=False /property:EnableCompressionInSingleFile=true /property:TrimMode=partial
